author: nickh2000
body:
#### PR description:

Ariana's additions of the gemChamberBXVFAT plots and gemBXVFATPerChamber were confirmed to be in the correct files. I've deleted some directories containing plots and root files, as well as any lxplus/local test files. Any added but commented code I deleted as well. 

#### PR validation:

Plots created with L1TStage2EMTF.cc and .h files were identical to the ones created with local_testv2_L1TStage2EMTF.cc and .h, and L1TStage2EMTF_cfi.py was changed to ensure plots were not being created in the local files.
title: GEM Cosmic Plots Integration
